attributes.action: Reverse the Decision to Recognise Chinese Sovereignty Over Tibet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We appeal to the government to reverse recognition of Chinese Sovereignty over Tibet which was passed through parliament on October 29th 2008.

rejection.details:
There are already several petition in existnece:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/condemnchina/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
